TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit TemplateColumn extends System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridColumn

summary.span: 表示 控件的列类型，它使您得以自定义列中的控件布局。

span.span: Represents a column type for the control that allows you to customize the layout of controls in the column.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用中的列类型控件来创建列，其中一个自定义的控件布局。Use the column type in a control to create a column with a customized control layout. 可以通过使用为标题部分、 页脚部分和列的项目部分中提供自定义外观， ，和属性，分别。You can provide a custom appearance for the heading section, the footer section, and the items section of the column by using the , , and properties, respectively. 你还可以控制正在编辑的项中的显示方式对象通过设置属性。You can also control how an item being edited is displayed in the object by setting the property. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用类，以创建中的列具有自定义布局控件。The following code example demonstrates how to use the class to create a column in the control with a custom layout. [!code-aspx-csharp[TemplateColumnEdit#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/TemplateColumnEdit/CS/templatecolumncs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[TemplateColumnEdit#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/TemplateColumnEdit/VB/templatecolumnvb.aspx#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此构造函数来创建和初始化的新实例类。Use this constructor to create and initialize a new instance of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: public virtual System.Web.UI.ITemplate EditItemTemplate { get; set; }

summary.span: 获取或设置用于显示 对象中选定的要进行编辑的项的模板。

span.span: Gets or sets the template for displaying the item selected for editing in a object.

value.span: 一个实现了 的对象，该对象包含用于显示在 中进行编辑的项的模板。

span.span: A -implemented object that contains the template for displaying the item being edited in the .

value.span: 默认值为 ，表示未设置此属性。

span.span: The default value is , which indicates that this property is not set.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性来控制为在中编辑选定的项的外观对象。Use the property to control the appearance of the item selected for editing in the object. 通过创建定义项的列中的呈现方式的模板。 指定的外观。The appearance is specified by creating a template that defines how the item is rendered in the column. 若要指定用于选择要编辑的项目的模板，请先打开和关闭``开始和结束标记之间的标记``元素。To specify a template for the item selected for editing, first place opening and closing `` tags between the opening and closing tags of the `` element. 然后可以列出的内容的控件的开始标记和结束之间的项的外观``标记。You can then list the content that controls the appearance of the item between the opening and closing `` tags. 内容可以是很简单的纯文本，也可使其更复杂通过将其他控件嵌入在模板中。The content can be as simple as plain text, or it can be made more complex by embedding other controls in the template. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性来控制正在编辑中的项的外观对象。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to control the appearance of the item being edited in the object. [!code-aspx-csharp[TemplateColumnEdit#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/TemplateColumnEdit/CS/templatecolumncs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[TemplateColumnEdit#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/TemplateColumnEdit/VB/templatecolumnvb.aspx#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性来控制中的页脚部分的外观对象。Use the property to control the appearance of the footer section in the object. 通过创建定义项的列中的呈现方式的模板。 指定的外观。The appearance is specified by creating a template that defines how the item is rendered in the column. 若要指定用于选择要编辑的项目的模板，请先打开和关闭``开始和结束标记之间的标记``元素。To specify a template for the item selected for editing, first place opening and closing `` tags between the opening and closing tags of the `` element. 然后可以列出的内容的控件的开始标记和结束之间的项的外观``标记。You can then list the content that controls the appearance of the item between the opening and closing `` tags. 内容可以是很简单的纯文本，也可使其更复杂通过将其他控件嵌入在模板中。The content can be as simple as plain text, or it can be made more complex by embedding other controls in the template. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性来控制中的页脚部分的外观对象。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to control the appearance of the footer section in the object. remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性来控制中的标题部分的外观对象。Use the property to control the appearance of the heading section in the object. 通过创建定义项的列中的呈现方式的模板。 指定的外观。The appearance is specified by creating a template that defines how the item is rendered in the column. 若要指定用于选择要编辑的项目的模板，请先打开和关闭``开始和结束标记之间的标记``元素。To specify a template for the item selected for editing, first place opening and closing `` tags between the opening and closing tags of the `` element. 然后可以列出的内容的控件的开始标记和结束之间的项的外观``标记。You can then list the content that controls the appearance of the item between the opening and closing `` tags. 内容可以很简单，只需为纯文本，或可以通过更复杂嵌入在模板中的其他控件。The content can be as simple as plain text, or can be made more complex by embedding other controls in the template. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性来控制中的标题部分的外观对象。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to control the appearance of the heading section in the object.
